channel.title: Complete Runescape Remake Anywhere?
channel.description: Hi, I'm just wondering if there is a completely finished remake of Runescape anywhere, as I cannot find one. By completely finished remake I mean with all skills working, all npcs and monsters with their drops, all shops, all everything so that it would be just like logging into the actual Runescape. I would prefer it be a remake of between 2007 and 2011, but anything is fine. Also, I would much rather it be a source and client download, so that my friends and I can play it on our own without other people running around doing stuff but hey, I'll take anything. I've seen a lot of people starting them, but have yet to actually find a finished product. Any help is appreciated, thanks!

item.title: Complete Runescape Remake Anywhere?
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Nice one. And the answer is no. There are none.

Read full topic

item.title: Complete Runescape Remake Anywhere?
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

No. If there are any, they’re for sure are not released to the public. Your best bet is to make your own like everyone else, or find one that’s being hosted to play.

Read full topic

item.title: Complete Runescape Remake Anywhere?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

OP asked for a source and client, not advertising (which is not allowed in the general server discussion section). Thread cleaned and moved.

Read full topic

item.title: Complete Runescape Remake Anywhere?
item.dc:creator: @MisterkNiss MisterkNiss
item.description:
@MisterkNiss wrote:

Hi, I’m just wondering if there is a completely finished remake of Runescape anywhere, as I cannot find one. By completely finished remake I mean with all skills working, all npcs and monsters with their drops, all shops, all everything so that it would be just like logging into the actual Runescape. I would prefer it be a remake of between 2007 and 2011, but anything is fine. Also, I would much rather it be a source and client download, so that my friends and I can play it on our own without other people running around doing stuff but hey, I’ll take anything. I’ve seen a lot of people starting them, but have yet to actually find a finished product. Any help is appreciated, thanks!
